tool_description:
Open source and fully functional Blackjack game. It is built on a REST based application programming interface (API). We have taken care of all the back-end complexities so you can concentrate on creating your own games.

Register to get your API credentials to start playing or download a developers build of the game. Read the documentation at http://docs.betgidy.com/blackjack-api/
name: Blackjack by Emgidy
title: Blackjack by Emgidy

api_list.name: http://api.emgidy.com/casino-games/blackjack/init
